about_the_game:
Attention! Identical packages can not be activated on the same account twice!
Attention! Identical ships from different purchased bundles are not compensated!

This pack includes:

  • Improved version of Jericho rank 9 covert ops interceptor “Nyx”
  • Special module “Plasma web Nyx”
  • Passive module “Reaper-8 converter”
  • Weapon “Deconstructor cannon”
  • Unique portrait “Forgotten”
  • Unique decor “Eyes of the universe”

Additionally, the pilot receives:
  • Permanent credit earnings bonus +10%
  • Paint “Enigma”
  • Decor “Web of lies”

Additionally, the pilot receives the modules:
  • “Orion” targeting complex
  • Adaptive Camo
  • Quantum defence
  • Shield Booster S
  • Vernier engines
  • Emergency barrier
  • Voltage regulator
  • EM-diffuser
  • Adaptive shield
  • Electronic guidance
  • Infrared scanner
  • Overclocked CPU

Special bonus for everyone who buys the bundle — Premium license for 90 days!

This unique machine was first created at the Ambrosia-VII plant. The mysterious Miss Summer promised it to the mercenaries as payment for a series of assignments. However, as it turned out, she had no intention of keeping that promise. “Nyx” was in fact destined for pirates under Summer’s control. The pirates were involved in the development of the ship — their engineers and “designers” worked on it.

Attention! Identical packages can not be activated on the same account twice!
Attention! Identical ships from different purchased bundles are not compensated!

This pack includes:

  • Improved version of Jericho rank 9 covert ops interceptor “Nyx”
  • Special module “Plasma web Nyx”
  • Passive module “Reaper-8 converter”
  • Weapon “Deconstructor cannon”
  • Unique portrait “Forgotten”
  • Unique decor “Eyes of the universe”

Additionally, the pilot receives:

  • Decor “Web of lies”

Additionally, the pilot receives the modules:

Special bonus for everyone who buys the bundle — Premium license for 90 days!

This unique machine was first created at the Ambrosia-VII plant. The mysterious Miss Summer promised it to the mercenaries as payment for a series of assignments. However, as it turned out, she had no intention of keeping that promise. “Nyx” was in fact destined for pirates under Summer’s control. The pirates were involved in the development of the ship — their engineers and “designers” worked on it.
name: Star Conflict - Nyx (Deluxe Edition)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz, Intel Core 2 Duo / 2.5 GHz, AMD A6-9220
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Video Card: 512 MB, NVidia / AMD Radeon / Intel (HD 3000, HD 4000) with support for Pixel Shader 3.0 (AMD Radeon X1000 not supported)
  • Hard Disk Space: 8.5 GB
  • Additional: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz, Intel Core 2 Duo / 2.5 GHz, AMD A6-9220
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Video Card: 1024 MB, NVidia GeForce 650 / AMD Radeon HD 5750
  • Hard Disk Space: 8.5 GB
  • Additional: Broadband Internet connection

supported_languages:
English*, Russian*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Portugal, Polish, Hungarian, Czech, Ukrainian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
